title: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and admin dashboard. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and order tracking.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features. Built with Angular and Firebase.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience. Built with Angular and PrimeNG, featuring responsive design and dark mode support.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Real-time weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and weather alerts. Integrates with multiple weather APIs.
